text:
it is sometimes needed to send additionals headers to the webdav server. an
addHeader() method in the WebdavResource would be very useful - a
method.setHeader could then be called in all methods before calling
client.executeMethod in order to send the header to the server.
creator: thomas.draier@codeva.net

text: Do you have a patch for that?
creator: ozeigermann@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 12910
patch proposal to add request headers
creator: thomas.draier@codeva.net
